name: dateless
content:
dateless adjective
(NO PARTNER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
with no romantic partner or no one to go out with romantically: The dateless guys say they feel stunned into terrified silence when they meet women. She was dateless on St Valentine's Day - she had not even received a card.
More examplesFewer examplesI was overweight, out of place, dateless for the prom.He sets out to woo her with the help of his equally unemployed and dateless friends.The matchmaker says many of her clients have all the right qualities but are still dateless.He's the loner, the bespectacled, dateless geek. In the show a dateless girl is given a makeover and then sent on a dream date with one of three men.

dateless adjective
(NO DAY)
with no date on it: The date features on most other pages so I'm not sure why this page is dateless.
not appearing to belong to any particular date or period of time: They wear classic suits and dateless dresses. Synonym
timeless
More examplesFewer examplesThey opted to leave the stories dateless to avoid pinning them down to any particular era.This is no period piece; it is a dateless classic that, like a good wine, improves with age.The image shows four men and a woman, dressed in dateless clothing.
